title: Zayn Malik's Acoustic Version Of 'I Don't Wanna Live Forever' Is Swoon-Worthy
text:
Zayn Malik's Acoustic Version Of 'I Don't Wanna Live Forever' Is Swoon-Worthy He sounds SO good. üòç 330 Minou Clark Associate Editor of News and Emerging Platforms, The Huffington Post 
Zayn Malik has been killing it as a solo artist with hits like ‚Äú Pillow Talk ,‚Äù and his recent collaboration with Taylor Swift on ‚Äú I Don‚Äôt Wanna Live Forever ‚Äù for the ‚Äú Fifty Shades Darker ‚Äù soundtrack is climbing the charts. 
Yes, we already love the song, but Malik‚Äôs recent acoustic rendition is giving us life. The stripped-down version of the pop jam is just so beautiful that it makes us emotional. Take a listen and you‚Äôll see what we mean. 
SO MANY FEELINGS. 
It‚Äôs nice to hear Malik‚Äôs voice in all its glory with no distractions. Boy, can that guy riff like a pro or what?! He absolutely killed it. We want more! 
We love you too, Zayn. Related...
